metadata.creator: Sergio Contreras
metadata.description: Pastors, priests, and immigrants from the Latin Catholic community discuss religion in Canada for immigrants and for the people in Chile. Advertisement of musical performance of Illapu on May 29 1988; other announcements.
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros. Bishop Carlos Camus
